title: Graphcrypto
author: Graphcrypto
content: New Airdrop: Pepperlyl (PPL)The rewards: 500,000 $PPL TokensFor completing all tasks: 10 $PPL TokensReferral: 10 $PPL TokensRate: ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©Focus: Participants who complete all tasks without exception will receive 10 $PPL Tokens eachReward for each referral you invite through your link 10 $PPL Tokens TokensAirdrop Link: Airdrop Bot‚ñ´Ô∏èJoin our Legit Community channel and Pepperlyl chat and write a positive message or ask a question about the project‚ñ´Ô∏èFollow Pepperlyl and Legit Community on Twitter and Retweet This Tweet¬† and @Tag 3 Friends and HashTag #LegitCommunity #Pepperlyl #NFT #Metaverse #Airdrop‚ñ´Ô∏èSubmit your Polygon wallet address in the botNote: Airdrop ends on 31 March. Distribution of awards 15 AprilAdditional Information: NFT MARKETPLACE A POWERFUL NFT COMMUNITIESWe are the first NFT Marketplace & Metaverse that allow NFTs artist, investors and team of dedicated individual to Mint, buy and sell NFTs Beyond Limit in Endless PossibilitiesOWN YOUR METAVERSEPepperlyl makes it possible for web3 communities and brands to own a whole Metaverse, a virtual world, a multiplayer game or experience, a part of an interconnected MultiveverseWebsite | Telegram | Twitter | DiscordDisclaimer: Please do your own research before joining to any airdrop project, also airdrop is 100% free. Don't send any fee or penny for receiving airdrop tokens. Just join airdrop for free.
